title: Jessie's Turkish delight
ingredients: ['350ml water', '600g caster sugar', '3 tablespoons golden syrup', '125ml orange juice', '3 tablespoons grated orange zest', '2 sachets unflavoured gelatin', '100g cornflour', '125ml cold water', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '100g chopped pistachio nuts', 'icing sugar for dusting']
